人生第一个付费正版游戏，买回来那会每天都会打几盘人机，到后来熟悉了一点弹道就跑到社区练枪服里跑打杀人，还拿过好几次第一，偶尔也玩玩僵尸逃跑和躲猫猫，虽然有点枯燥无味但也承载了我那半年多的快乐；直到15年买了csgo之后慢慢吧中心转移到csgo这个游戏上面，现在再回来玩的时候却感到了各种不适应，连枪都不会压，真不知道以前是怎么跑打还能打死人的

Back when this was but a humble mod that started life on Half-Life then grew to become the game we all came to love and made itself part of our history. From the early BETA to the 1.6 release, Counter-Strike has lived a long time and made an impact to the world of gamers and it has seen itself getting new additions to the series.
This is where Source decides to step in and change it up with the physics engine and a more detailed world to run around and use to your advantage.

Depending on which side you've choosen to fight with, you will be pitted against Terrorists or Counter-Terrorists on a match to fulfill your team's objective while using weaponry and cover to bring down those who oppose you in an everlasting war that seems to last for years to no end. Be it with a sniper rifle from up above in a building, to the shotgun to blow up someone's brains out right around the corner, the choice of weapon and playstyle is up to you. But do not forget - death will put you out of the round until the end, and so will happen to your allies and enemies alike. Plan ahead and plan accordingly.

There's not much else to say, it's Counter-Strike! We've seen this gem a lot of times that it's hard to even forget.

Counter-Strike: Source is probably one of best FPS game. 
100% fantastic game.
I bought it at the Steam Grand Prix Summer 2019, for less than 1€ :D
